reference: Olson, Craig A. (1998) “A comparison of parametric and semiparametric estimates of the effect of spousal health insurance coverage on weekly hours worked by wives”, Journal of Applied Econometrics, 13(5), September–October, 543–565.
description:

a cross-section from 1993

title: Health Insurance and Hours Worked By Wives
